name: Steel Bastard Sword
description: A large and heavy sword made of steel, capable of dealing heavy damage to enemies.
looks: The Steel Bastard Sword has a long, straight blade with a sharp edge. The handle is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skills.two_handed_sword: Allows the wielder to use two-handed sword skills.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A long and sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel longsword has a double-edged blade with a silver tint. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, and the pommel is adorned with a decorative emblem.

special_weapon_skils.sword_proficiency: Grants a bonus to Sword Proficiency skill.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The sword has a straight blade with a hilt wrapped in leather. It is about 3 feet long and has a sharp edge.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Enchanted Amulet
description: A magical amulet imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The amulet is made of a shimmering crystal pendant suspended from a delicate silver chain. It emits a soft glow and pulses with magical energy.

special_effects.healing_boost: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells.

name: Sword of the Sun
description: A powerful sword imbued with the essence of the sun
looks: The Sword of the Sun has a golden hilt adorned with intricate carvings of sun rays. The blade is long and shining, as if it radiates its own light.

special_weapon_skils.sword: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

special_effects.sunlight_strike: Grants a chance to deal bonus fire damage on hit.

name: Blessed Sword
description: A holy sword imbued with the power of divine blessings.
looks: The Blessed Sword has a shining blade with intricate engravings of holy symbols. The hilt is made of golden metal and is adorned with white gemstones.

special_weapon_skills.divine_slayer: Increases damage dealt to enemies with dark affinity.

name: Greatsword of the Dragon
description: A powerful greatsword forged with dragon's fire, capable of cleaving through even the toughest armor.
looks: The Greatsword of the Dragon is a massive weapon, with a long and broad blade that is adorned with intricate dragon engravings. The hilt is crafted from the bone of a dragon, giving it a unique and intimidating appearance.

special_weapon_skils.two_handed_sword: Allows the wielder to use the Two-Handed Sword skill.

special_effects.dragon_slayer: Deals bonus damage to dragon-type enemies.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of fire.
looks: The blade of the Flaming Sword is made of a flowing red and orange energy, with flames flickering along its length. The hilt is made of blackened steel, adorned with intricate carvings of flames.

special_weapon_skills.flaming_slash: Unleashes a powerful slash attack that deals additional fire damage.

special_effects.fire_surge: Periodically releases a burst of flames, damaging nearby enemies.

name: Silver Sword
description: A sturdy sword made from silver
looks: The sword has a silver blade with an intricate pattern engraved on it. The hilt is made from polished wood and wrapped with leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to swordsmanship skill.

name: Steel Gauntlets
looks: The gauntlets are made of polished steel with intricate engravings. They have fingerless design and provide excellent hand protection.

name: Bow of the Forest
description: A longbow made from the finest wood, carved with intricate forest designs.
looks: The Bow of the Forest is made from a combination of oak and pine wood, carefully crafted to provide both strength and flexibility. It is adorned with delicate carvings of leaves and branches, giving it a natural and harmonious appearance.

special_weapon_skills.archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

special_effects.precision: Increases critical hit chance with bows.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy armor made from strong steel plates.
looks: The Steel Plate Armor consists of large steel plates that cover the entire body, providing excellent protection. It has a matte finish and is adorned with engravings of dragons and other mythical creatures.

name: Steel Greaves
description: A pair of sturdy steel greaves that protect the lower legs.
looks: The steel greaves are made of solid steel with a smooth surface. They cover the lower legs and have an adjustable strap that secures them in place. There are small openings for ventilation.

name: Ruby Sword
description: A sword with a blade made of ruby, known for its sharpness and durability.
looks: The Ruby Sword has a hilt made of blackened steel and a blade crafted from a polished ruby gemstone. The blade is single-edged and razor-sharp, glimmering in the light.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when used.

name: Diamond Ring
description: A beautiful diamond ring, symbolizing luxury and wealth.
looks: The diamond ring features a large, sparkling diamond set in a band of gold. The diamond is cut in a classic round shape, with excellent clarity and brilliance.
